## NodeDocument.inject() method

Injects an instance of NodeDocument into the global object as "document" if one doesn't exist already (ie. it does nothing in the browser nor on subsequent calls).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static inject(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
